title: Knuck If You Buc
description:
Mina and Domonique Foxworth discuss the marvelous schematic performances by both Todd Bowles and Byron Leftwich in the Super Bowl, the myriad of lessons the Bucs learned in their Week 12 loss to Kansas City, how the Chiefs waited too long to run the ball, and why the GOAT debate is officially over-- Gronk is the best TE ever and Kelce isn't catching him.
Plus, they react to Russell Wilson saying he's been sacked too much and suggest that Houston should trade Deshaun Watson to improve a depleted Texans roster.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Omaha Productions, Mina Kimes
